feed.title: Track Awesome Spark Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: A curated list of awesome Apache Spark packages and resources.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Oct 24, 2024
entry.content:
Packages / Language Bindings

  • spark-connect-csharp (⭐2) - C# bindings.

Packages / General Purpose Libraries

  • spark-daria (⭐761) - A Scala library with essential Spark functions and extensions to make you more productive.
  • quinn (⭐674) - A native PySpark implementation of spark-daria.

Packages / Storage

  • Apache Hudi (⭐5.9k) - Upserts, Deletes And Incremental Processing on Big Data..
  • Apache Iceberg (⭐7.7k) - Upserts, Deletes And Incremental Processing on Big Data..

Packages / Data quality

  • python-deequ (⭐784) - Python API for Deequ.

Packages / Testing

  • spark-fast-tests (⭐447) - A lightweight and fast testing framework.
  • chispa (⭐701) - PySpark test helpers with beautiful error messages.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Oct 03, 2024
entry.content:
Packages / Language Bindings

  • spark-connect-rs (⭐109) - Rust bindings.
  • spark-connect-go (⭐222) - Golang bindings.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Apr 18, 2023
entry.content:
Packages / Middleware

  • Apache Kyuubi (⭐2.2k) - A distributed multi-tenant JDBC server for large-scale data processing and analytics, built on top of Apache Spark.

Resources / Docker Images

  • apache/spark - Apache Spark Official Docker images.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Feb 27, 2023
entry.content:
Packages / Language Bindings

  • Kotlin for Apache Spark (⭐471) - Kotlin API bindings and extensions.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Dec 30, 2021
entry.content:
Packages / GIS

  • Apache Sedona (⭐2.1k) - Cluster computing system for processing large-scale spatial data.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Dec 20, 2021
entry.content:
Packages / Machine Learning Extension

  • MLflow - Machine learning orchestration platform.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Dec 12, 2021
entry.content:
Resources / Docker Images

  • datamechanics/spark - An easy to setup Docker image for Apache Spark from Data Mechanics.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Dec 06, 2021
entry.content:
Packages / General Purpose Libraries

  • Joblib Apache Spark Backend (⭐249) - joblib backend for running tasks on Spark clusters.

Packages / Storage

  • lakeFS - Integration with the lakeFS atomic versioned storage layer.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Nov 29, 2021
entry.content:
Packages / Notebooks and IDEs

  • Polynote - Polynote: an IDE-inspired polyglot notebook. It supports mixing multiple languages in one notebook, and sharing data between them seamlessly. It encourages reproducible notebooks with its immutable data model. Originating from Netflix.

Packages / Machine Learning Extension

  • Microsoft ML for Apache Spark (⭐5.1k) - A distributed ml library with support for LightGBM, Vowpal Wabbit, OpenCV, Deep Learning, Cognitive Services, and Model Deployment.

Packages / Natural Language Processing

  • spark-nlp (⭐4k) - Natural language processing library built on top of Apache Spark ML.

Resources / Papers

  • Structured Streaming: A Declarative API for Real-Time Applications in Apache Spark - Structured Streaming is a new high-level streaming API, it is a declarative API based on automatically incrementalizing a static relational query.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Aug 18, 2021
entry.content:
Packages / General Purpose Libraries

  • Apache DataFu (⭐119) - A library of general purpose functions and UDF's.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Aug 15, 2021
entry.content:
Resources / Books

  • Learning Spark, 2nd Edition - Introduction to Spark API with Spark 3.0 covered. Good source of knowledge about basic concepts.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Mar 17, 2021
entry.content:
Packages / Monitoring

  • Data Mechanics Delight (⭐344) - Cross-platform monitoring tool (Spark UI / Spark History Server replacement).

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Feb 19, 2021
entry.content:
Packages / General Purpose Libraries

  • itachi (⭐59) - A library that brings useful functions from modern database management systems to Apache Spark.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Nov 02, 2020
entry.content:
Packages / Storage

  • Delta Lake (⭐8.1k) - Storage layer with ACID transactions.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Oct 09, 2020
entry.content:
Packages / Interfaces

  • Koalas (⭐3.4k) - Pandas DataFrame API on top of Apache Spark.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Oct 01, 2020
entry.content:
Packages / Language Bindings

  • .NET for Apache Spark (⭐2.1k) - .NET bindings.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Sep 23, 2020
entry.content:
Packages / Utilities

  • Optimus (⭐1.5k) - Data Cleansing and Exploration utilities with the goal of simplifying data cleaning.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Sep 22, 2020
entry.content:
Resources / Papers

  • Large-Scale Intelligent Microservices - Microsoft paper that presents an Apache Spark-based micro-service orchestration framework that extends database operations to include web service primitives.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Jul 16, 2020
entry.content:
Packages / Middleware

  • Livy (⭐915) - REST server with extensive language support (Python, R, Scala), ability to maintain interactive sessions and object sharing.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Dec 13, 2019
entry.content:
Packages / Data quality

  • deequ (⭐3.5k) - Deequ is a library built on top of Apache Spark for defining "unit tests for data", which measure data quality in large datasets.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Nov 28, 2019
entry.content:
Packages / Notebooks and IDEs

  • almond - A scala kernel for Jupyter.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Jan 26, 2019
entry.content:
Packages / Web Archives

  • Archives Unleashed Toolkit (⭐144) - Open-source toolkit for analyzing web archives.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Aug 14, 2018
entry.content:
Packages / Language Bindings

  • sparklyr (⭐963) - An alternative R backend, using dplyr.
  • sparkle (⭐448) - Haskell on Apache Spark.

Packages / Notebooks and IDEs

  • Apache Zeppelin - Web-based notebook that enables interactive data analytics with plugable backends, integrated plotting, and extensive Spark support out-of-the-box.
  • sparkmagic (⭐1.4k) - Jupyter magics and kernels for working with remote Spark clusters, for interactively working with remote Spark clusters through Livy (⭐1k), in Jupyter notebooks.

Packages / SQL Data Sources

  • Spark XML (⭐511) - XML parser and writer.
  • Spark Cassandra Connector (⭐1.9k) - Cassandra support including data source and API and support for arbitrary queries.
  • Mongo-Spark (⭐723) - Official MongoDB connector.

Packages / Bioinformatics

  • ADAM (⭐1k) - Set of tools designed to analyse genomics data.
  • Hail (⭐1k) - Genetic analysis framework.

Packages / Graph Processing

  • GraphFrames (⭐1.1k) - Data frame based graph API.
  • neo4j-spark-connector (⭐312) - Bolt protocol based, Neo4j Connector with RDD, DataFrame and GraphX / GraphFrames support.

Packages / Machine Learning Extension

  • Apache SystemML - Declarative machine learning framework on top of Spark.
  • Mahout Spark Bindings [status unknown] - linear algebra DSL and optimizer with R-like syntax.
  • JPMML-Spark (⭐94) - PMML transformer library for Spark ML.
  • ModelDB - A system to manage machine learning models for spark.ml and scikit-learn .
  • Sparkling Water (⭐973) - H2O interoperability layer.
  • BigDL (⭐8.1k) - Distributed Deep Learning library.
  • MLeap (⭐1.5k) - Execution engine and serialization format which supports deployment of o.a.s.ml models without dependency on SparkSession.

Packages / Middleware

  • spark-jobserver (⭐2.8k) - Simple Spark as a Service which supports objects sharing using so called named objects. JVM only.
  • Apache Toree (⭐745) - IPython protocol based middleware for interactive applications.

Packages / Utilities

  • sparkly (⭐62) - Helpers & syntactic sugar for PySpark.
  • Flintrock (⭐643) - A command-line tool for launching Spark clusters on EC2.

Packages / Streaming

  • Apache Bahir - Collection of the streaming connectors excluded from Spark 2.0 (Akka, MQTT, Twitter. ZeroMQ).

Packages / Interfaces

  • Apache Beam - Unified data processing engine supporting both batch and streaming applications. Apache Spark is one of the supported execution environments.

Packages / Testing

  • spark-testing-base (⭐1.5k) - Collection of base test classes.

Packages / Workflow Management

  • Cromwell (⭐1k) - Workflow management system with Spark backend (⭐1k).

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Apr 12, 2017
entry.content:
Resources / Papers

  • Spark SQL: Relational Data Processing in Spark - Paper introducing relational underpinnings, code generation and Catalyst optimizer.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Apr 05, 2017
entry.content:
Resources / Papers

  • Resilient Distributed Datasets: A Fault-Tolerant Abstraction for In-Memory Cluster Computing - Paper introducing a core distributed memory abstraction.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Mar 02, 2017
entry.content:
Resources / Books

  • Advanced Analytics with Spark - Useful collection of Spark processing patterns. Accompanying GitHub repository: sryza/aas (⭐1.5k).
  • Mastering Apache Spark - Interesting compilation of notes by Jacek Laskowski. Focused on different aspects of Spark internals.
  • Spark in Action - New book in the Manning's "in action" family with +400 pages. Starts gently, step-by-step and covers large number of topics. Free excerpt on how to setup Eclipse for Spark application development and how to bootstrap a new application using the provided Maven Archetype. You can find the accompanying GitHub repo here (⭐272).

Resources / MOOCS

  • Data Science and Engineering with Apache Spark (edX XSeries) - Series of five courses (Introduction to Apache Spark, Distributed Machine Learning with Apache Spark, Big Data Analysis with Apache Spark, Advanced Apache Spark for Data Science and Data Engineering, Advanced Distributed Machine Learning with Apache Spark) covering different aspects of software engineering and data science. Python oriented.

Resources / Workshops

  • AMP Camp - Periodical training event organized by the UC Berkeley AMPLab. A source of useful exercise and recorded workshops covering different tools from the Berkeley Data Analytics Stack.

Resources / Projects Using Spark

  • Oryx 2 (⭐1.8k) - Lambda architecture platform built on Apache Spark and Apache Kafka with specialization for real-time large scale machine learning.

Resources / Miscellaneous

  • Spark with Scala Gitter channel - "A place to discuss and ask questions about using Scala for Spark programming" started by @deanwampler.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Oct 22, 2016
entry.content:
Resources / Miscellaneous

  • Apache Spark User List and Apache Spark Developers List - Mailing lists dedicated to usage questions and development topics respectively.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Jun 26, 2016
entry.content:
Resources / Projects Using Spark

  • Crossdata (⭐169) - Data integration platform with extended DataSource API and multi-user environment.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Jun 22, 2016
entry.content:
Resources / Projects Using Spark

  • Photon ML (⭐796) - A machine learning library supporting classical Generalized Mixed Model and Generalized Additive Mixed Effect Model.

Resources / Docker Images

  • sequenceiq/docker-spark (⭐763) - Yarn images from SequenceIQ.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Jun 21, 2016
entry.content:
Resources / Docker Images

  • jupyter/docker-stacks/pyspark-notebook (⭐8.3k) - PySpark with Jupyter Notebook and Mesos client.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Jun 11, 2016
entry.content:
Resources / MOOCS

  • Big Data Analysis with Scala and Spark (Coursera) - Scala oriented introductory course. Part of Functional Programming in Scala Specialization.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Jun 10, 2016
entry.content:
Packages / Machine Learning Extension

  • KeystoneML - Type safe machine learning pipelines with RDDs.

entry.title: Awesome Spark Updates on Feb 02, 2016
entry.content:
Resources / Projects Using Spark

  • PredictionIO - Machine Learning server for developers and data scientists to build and deploy predictive applications in a fraction of the time.
